name: Alien Factor
description:
Alien Factor is a 2D puzzle game where players control a group of aliens attempting to flee from a hidden government facility. Evade guards and cameras trying to return you to your containment. Use powers such as exploiting electricity, levitating objects using telekinesis, and sliding your slime body through vents to maneuver and solve puzzles!

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR DOWNLOADING FROM MAC OS DEVICE 

Follow this YouTube tutorial to be able to run the game and bypass Mac Permissions  

How to fix "you do not have permission to open the application "Game app", another easy solution - YouTube

How To Download on PC

1. Download the compressed zip file for your device. 

2. Unzip the folder into a new folder. 

3. From there open the new folder and open the .exe file titled Official-Capstone-Game.

4. Enjoy :)
